name: Laser Slice
description:
Aliens come back! How is your reflex? How much fast your fingers?

Can you shot and slice falling aliens with laser gun?
Laser Slice is retro style shooter game. 80's popular Atari game "Space Invaders" re-designed for more action. This game created for only endless fun!

Key Features:
+ Original game concept.
+ Energetic and unique game play.
+ Retro style graphics.
+ Great sound effects and music.
+ Impressive special visual effects.
+ No ADS & No In-App purchases.
